column5: I have an oportunity to Upgrage my flippin stick... I local guide is getting rid of some equipment and has a 7ft Heavy fast action Convergence for $45 bucks. Ill inspect the condition when I come to pick it up... but a friend of mine bought a whack load of rods off this particular guide and they were mint !  Just wondering if that is a good deal Ã‰ Thanks !
pretty good deal. Worth $70+tax new @ Lebarons.
Yep they are good rods and thats a good deal. If you break it you can upgrade to a better one and pay the difference. I broke a convergance and got a new compre for 40 bucks or something like that.
